trans-unit.source: An <see langword="abstract" /> class that the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) derives from <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to do serialization and deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see langword="abstract" /> 類別，這是 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 為了要執行序列化和還原序列化而衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 的類別。

trans-unit.source: Methods in this class read <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionary> objects.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別中的方法會讀取 <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionary> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This class is derived from <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: 此類別衍生自 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>。

trans-unit.source: Note that there is a known issue with the normalization of linefeed characters inside of CDATA sections that you may encounter.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，您可能會在正規化 CDATA 區段中的換行字元時遇到問題，而這是個已知問題。

trans-unit.source: `includeComments` defines whether comments are to be included in the canonical input and `inclusivePrefixes` provides the list of prefixes to be treated as inclusive prefixes with the exclusive canonicalization algorithm.
